congrats_data.msg:
You have completed the programme. Well done!
Remember, you can always return to ParentText to review these tips. Just type {MENU}.

make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: The tip you haven't finished is:
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: Which tip would you like to receive?

make_options_wrapper_data.msg_no_options.message: You haven't received any tips yet.
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.message: You have received the following tip:
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.question: Would you like to review it?
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_one_option.no_message: That's okay. You can come back here at any time to review it.
make_options_wrapper_data.msg_multiple_options: You have completed @fields.n_s_modules_compl out of @fields.n_s_modules tips. Which of the following tips would you like to review?

description_data.msg: In this program, you will receive @fields.c_n_mod tips. You will receive a new tip each day. Your first tip is "@results.name".

wa_templates.text:
A new tip is ready for you. Would you like to continue now?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. No, remind me tomorrow.
wa_templates.fra:
Un nouveau conseil est disponible. Voulez-vous continuer maintenant ?

Appuyez sur un numéro de votre clavier:
1. Oui
2. Non, rappelez-moi cela demain

wa_templates.text:
You and your family are facing a challenging time. ParentText provides tips on how you can support your child during this crisis. Would you like to recieve your first tip now?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Yes
2. Remind me tomorrow
wa_templates.fra:
Vous et votre famille traversez une période difficile. ParentText vous donne des conseils sur la manière dont vous pouvez soutenir votre enfant pendant cette crise. Souhaitez-vous recevoir votre premier conseil dès maintenant ?

Appuyez sur un numéro de votre clavier:
1. Oui
2. Non, rappelez-moi cela demain

wa_templates.text:
It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Receive the remaining information
2. Remind me about this tomorrow
3. I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot.
wa_templates.fra:
On dirait que vous avez commencé avec un conseil pour parents, mais que vous n'avez pas fini de recevoir toutes les informations. Que voulez-vous faire ?

Appuyez sur un numéro de votre clavier:
1. Recevez les informations restantes
2. Rappelez-moi cela demain
3. J'ai fini de recevoir toutes les informations que je souhaitais de la part de ce chatbot.

wa_templates.text:
It looks like you started to receive tips, but haven't finished receiving all of them. You have @fields.c_n_mod_started tips with more information available for you. What would you like to do?

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Receive the remaining information
2. Remind me about this tomorrow
3. I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot.
wa_templates.fra:
Il semble que vous ayez commencé à recevoir des conseils, mais que vous n'ayez pas fini de les recevoir tous. Vous avez @fields.c_n_mod_started conseils avec plus d'informations à votre disposition. Que voulez-vous faire ?

Appuyez sur un numéro de votre clavier:
1. Recevez les informations restantes
2. Rappelez-moi cela demain
3. J'ai fini de recevoir toutes les informations que je souhaitais de la part de ce chatbot.

wa_templates.text:
It’s a difficult moment for your family. I’m here today with a few tips to create small moments of connection with your child to give them the routine and stability you all need right now. Press 1 to continue with your registration. 

Press a number on your keypad:
1. Continue my registration
2. Remind me tomorrow
wa_templates.fra:
C'est un moment difficile pour votre famille. Je suis ici aujourd'hui pour vous donner quelques conseils afin de créer de petits moments de complicité avec votre enfant afin de lui donner les bonnes habitudes et la stabilité dont vous avez tous besoin en ce moment. Appuyez sur 1 pour continuer votre inscription. 

Appuyez sur un numéro de votre clavier:
1. Continuer mon inscription
2. Rappelez-le moi demain

wa_templates.text: This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
wa_templates.fra: Cette période est difficile. Apparemment, vous n'avez pas le temps de suivre ces conseils pour l'instant. Lorsque vous êtes prêt à continuer, appuyez sur 1.

wa_templates.text:
It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. Would you like to receive it now or start a new tip?
 
Press a number on your keypad:
1. Complete my previous tip
2. Receive a new tip
3. Remind me tomorrow
wa_templates.fra:
On dirait que vous avez commencé avec un conseil pour parents, mais que vous n'avez pas fini de recevoir toutes les informations. Voulez-vous les recevoir maintenant ou commencer un nouveau conseil ?

Appuyez sur un numéro de votre clavier:
1. Appliquer l'astuce précédente
2. Recevez une nouvelle astuce
3. Rappelez-le moi demain

interaction_data.question: It’s a difficult moment for your family. I’m here today with a few tips to create small moments of connection with your child to give them the routine and stability you all need right now. Press 1 to continue with your registration.
It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. Would you like to receive it now or start a new tip?
It looks like you started a parenting tip, but didn't finish receiving all of the information. What would you like to do?
interaction_data.options.3.text: I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot.

interaction_data.question: It looks like you started to receive tips, but haven't finished receiving all of them. You have @fields.c_n_mod_started tips with more information available for you. What would you like to do?
interaction_data.options.3.text: I've finished receiving all of the information that I want from this chatbot.

interaction_data.question: You and your family are facing a challenging time. ParentText provides tips on how you can support your child during this crisis. Would you like to recieve your first tip now?
A new tip is ready for you. Would you like to continue now?

activity_offer_data.offer_msg: What would you like to do next?
activity_offer_data.accept.child: I want an idea for an activity I can do with my child to connect with them
activity_offer_data.refuse_msg: Alright. I will share another tip tomorrow.
activity_offer_data.next_offer_msg: What would you like to do?

activity_offer_data.offer_msg: What would you like to do next?
activity_offer_data.accept.child: I want an idea for an activity I can do with my child to connect with them
activity_offer_data.refuse_msg: Alright. I will share another tip tomorrow.
activity_offer_data.next_offer_msg: What would you like to do?
What would you like to do?

delivery_messages.msg: What kind of activity do you want to try with your child?
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message for choosing which type of activity to do. Types in "activity_type_data"

delivery_messages.msg: This time is difficult. It doesn't seem like you have the time for the these tips right now. When you are ready to keep going, press 1.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: hook message sent after 3 days of no response from the user. Needs to be aligned with whatsapp template "no_response". 1 can be replaced by anything (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

delivery_messages.msg: Let’s get started. Press NEXT to begin.
delivery_messages.metadata.description: message received before the first module. It has a NEXT button, where NEXT can be replaced by anything  (anything typed in the chat will work anyway)

completion_tracker_data.msg: There are @(fields.c_n_mod - fields.c_n_mod_compl) more tips. You'll receive a new one tomorrow.
There is one more tip. You'll receive it tomorrow.
